item.title: Mia add a quote by Nobuhiro Watsuki
item.description: "oro?!" -- Nobuhiro Watsuki

item.title: Mia add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Oh well... I'd just been thinking, if you had died, you'd have been welcome to share my toilet." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Yeah, Quirrell was a great teacher. There was just that minor drawback of him having Lord Voldemort sticking out of the back of his head!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We're all human, aren't we? Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Let us step into the night and pursue that flighty temptress, adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "The truth." Dumbledore sighed. "It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "The scar had not pained Harry for nineteen years. All was well." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Harry was left to ponder in silence the depths to which girls would sink to get revenge." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J. K. Rowling
item.description: "Where is Wood?" said Harry, suddenly realizing he wasn't there. "Still in the showers," said Fred. "We think he's trying to drown himself." -- J. K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Would it hurt to die?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J. K. Rowling
item.description: "For future reference, Harry, it is raspberry...although of course, if I were a Death Eater, I would have been sure to research my own jam preferences before impersonating myself." -- J. K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I took a wrong turn on the way to the bathroom and found myself in a beautifully proportioned room I had never seen before, containing a really rather magnificent collection of chamberpots. When I went back to investigate more closely, I discovered that the room had vanished. But I must keep an eye out for it. Possibly it is only accessible at five thirty in the morning. Or it may only appear at the quarter moon - or when the seeker has an exceptionally full bladder." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Percy wouldn't notice a joke if it danced naked in front of him wearing one of Dobby's hats." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "So why in the name of Merlin’s saggy left —” “Don’t talk to your mother like that." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Accio Brain!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is my belief... that the truth is generally preferable to lies." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Youth can not know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mia add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and, above all those who live without love." -- J.K. Rowling
